meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Shody Bob Kochersberger Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6826.

td.p: Sarah Shody, a lawyer from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Bob Kochersberger, a journalism professor from Raleigh, North Carolina
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 5-day cash winnings total $102,810)

tr.td: WHAT "ITIS" IS IT?
TENNIS TIPS
GETTING POSSESSIVE
2-LETTER SCRABBLE WORDS
APPROXIMATE WEIGHTS & MEASURES
(Adelaide Kane: The passions and power struggles around Mary, Queen of Scots, in between the lines of the history books.) (Alex: And you can watch Reign on the CW network, of course.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
